title: Rune pages?!
body:
Hi all! 
I was just wondering if someone knows anything about were to find rune pages so that i can buy more ;)
Cant find them anywere at the store and was hoping if someone knew anything

replies.body:
Yup, as *Zeds* mentioned, if you have all your sorting parameters set to *Show All* you should see them pop right up! I've included a screenshot below:

(Click to enlarge)

https://imgur.com/a/Voa4j

Let me know if this helped!
Under gameplay you need to change the selection from tier 2/3 or whatever you have selected to all. They will appear first!
